name: Shawanna Grant
text: Wondering couple and great customer service skills and I feel In love with the banner

name: Jared Garfield
text: Michael Godwin is a true Southern gentleman, who goes above and beyond to meet client expectations.  When I first walked into his store he stayed way after hours to meet my needs.  His recommendations were excellent and innovative, especially his "window perf sign process" that will give me one of the best storefronts in the Historic Prattville downtown.  His prices are excellent, and he was even willing to match national pricing from a big warehouse vendor for my real estate signs!  If you want small town service, big city professionalism and great pricing, Central Alabama Sign & Banner is your place.

name: Kimberly Cole Zemke
text: He has been our sign man for years!  He does superior work!!  Great prices and fast service!! He is very creative and stays  on the cusp of new technologies!  Give Michael a try and you will be very satisfied with his work.

resp.text: Thank You

name: Evita B
text:
Went in to get an outdoor retail sign. Gave my information and was told someone would come out and measure. They never did. I called about 3 weeks later and was told someone would come out that day to measure. Waited at the location all day until about 8pm. No one showed up. I've heard a similar story from another business owner about them never showing up or calling back. Decided to go with SignOps and they were very helpful, and got our sign made and up within a week of contacting them and approving the design. They handled everything and it looks perfect!

Response. "Perceived"? No one came to measure and he admitted he didn't come and measure the first time, citing the holidays. I visited the shop before the holidays and in 3 weeks time, no one measured or contacted me. After I called, he never came that day after saying he would. I was there all day, and no one measured and no one contacted me. I do not have any calls from this place and I gave my cellphone number and address. Place is like 10 to 15 minutes away. As I said, another business has had the same experience. People reading this review can decide for themselves from my "perceived" experience. Thank you and have a nice day.

resp.text: I am very sorry for your perceived experience.  One of our salesmen did go out and measure for your sign. After repeated attempts to contact you with no response on your part, we figured you decided to go another route.  If there is anything we can do for you in the future, please do not hesitate to contact us.

name: Tiffany Trueblood-Adkins
text: These folks are great to work with! They do a superb job and always help when I'm in rush for time!

name: Alisa B
text: This family owned/run business is awesome.  Always friendly, great customer service.  I have purchased several monogrammed products from Central Alabama Sign and every single one was perfect!

name: Janyth Grimes
text: Would not exchange return damaged merchandise.

resp.text: I'm sorry that we would not be able to return your item.   There was no receipt for return and the item did not leave our store in the condition that you attempted to return it in (Stained with black marks and cut under the arm).  We inspect our clothing items carefully and do not sell unacceptable product.

name: Mickey Berry
text: This was such a cool place when it was in the old location! It’s ok now, but you used to be able to go in there and find anything and everything!  I think it’s more of a craft store now? The people were nice and the gentleman who helped us was very courteous.  I just didn’t find it to be like it used to be.  We’ll give it another chance!

name: Katrina Gamble Parker
text: Great place to get unique gifts and old fashioned toys for kids!

name: S Taylor
text: I bring my kids up here with me and we love this store. You can find just about anything your creative mind can conjure up.

name: Susan Woods-Ross
text: Always amazing!!! Mary Ann has the God given ability to remember most everyone who has brought their children in by name and watched our children grow up. She is truly one of a kind. We all love her!

name: Claude Freeman
text: Truly a place for a person that has everything- but not a bird whistle, or a bullet box to put remotes in. Did I mention they have seasonal stuff? Great old toys too! Highly recommend this place.

name: Kursten Terrell
text: Been coming here sonce I was a child. This is my happy place!!

name: Izz Noland
text: Great place to get all kinds of old knick knacks. They were the only place around still receiving and selling solar eclipse glasses, and opened days and hours they normally would not.

resp.text: It was truly our pleasure...thank you SO much!

name: Michael Annunziata
text: Lots of cool little things to find here. I always drop by to find stocking stuffers for Christmas

name: LA Huffstutler
text: Great for finding something different and it supported community vendor.

name: Zoe Read
text: Not a good variety store. Lots of unorganized or empty shelves.

name: Kevin Nelson
text: Wonderful store to find hard to find gifts

name: Tania
text: This place is great

name: Jessie Bunton
text: Wide variety of odds and ends, kinda pricey

name: Stuart Jinnette
text: Has a wide varity

name: Mary Yant
text: Great work and fast turn around time.

resp.text: Thank you girl! Glad to help out. Come see me again sometime.

name: Meagan Taylor
text: The lady is SO nice and helpful! Prices are great and their selection is super cute. Turn around time was a week. Would recommend to everyone!!!

resp.text: Thank you,  Meagan for those kind words.  We loved meeting you! Can't wait to monogram for you again!

name: Ira Moss
text: I was pleased to meet you! My My My I was blown away with the professionalism and service I received. We had a wonderful conversation. I am glad that I took my items to you. God is so good and the crosses that you did have gotten a lot of attention. Mrs. Rita I am a customer who believes that if it's not broken don't fix it. P.S. I never give a perfect score  because there is always room for improvement. So you have my business and recommendation to all my friends who need monogramming done. Pastor Moss. Again Thank You.

resp.text: Thank you Pastor Moss. It was such a blessing for me to get to meet you.

name: Nita Blankenship
text: I have been going to the Monogram Spot since they opened in Gardendale. I love the new location with more room. The staff is friendly always very courteous and willing to help. I highly recommend this shop. They did monogram something and I loved it.

name: Melissa Walker
text: I love the selection here!  Reata has not only monogrammed stuff and printed unique items for us, but I’ve found several gift items for both kids and adults.  She does a great job and always turns items around quickly.

resp.text: Thank you, Melissa. We enjoy your visits to the store!

name: Preston Franklin
text: Called ahead to be sure they could do custom monogram in one day  (something simple). They agreed and said that will be no problem,  just a $10 rush fee. I arrived to be told this was not true and they would not help me. This place was out of the way but had great reviews so I thought they would honor what they had said on the phone. It's too bad that they over-promised and lost my business forever.

resp.text: Sorry we could not do rush order at the moment you came in. We told you as we do all customers that we do rush orders when it is available.  1pm on Saturday afternoon is too late to get a rush monogram before close of business that day.  It was not possible to do today.  I'm sorry you feel that you were wronged.  We have very good customer service and try to go out of our way for every monogram and customer.  You left in such a hurry,  you didn't give us a chance to even try to help you.

name: Gardendale Music
text: Always very friendly. Has great prices and sales. Does really good work! Highly recommend!

name: MyFathers TwoAcres
text: Really nice people.  Really fast service and great looking work.  Will be back

resp.text: Thank you so much. We appreciate your business and are glad to help any way we can!.

name: Caroline Rose
text: Great experience at Monogram Spot!  Awesome service and merchandise. Always so helpful when I would like to come up with my own shirt designs but has great designs to choose from.

resp.text: We love you Ms.Caroline!

name: Allison Marlow
text: I was in a bind because I needed to change my son's number on his uniform. Monogram Spot saved the day by being able to remove the old number and replace it with the new one. It saved me having to purchase a brand new goalie jersey. The staff is friendly and helpful!

resp.text: Thank you for letting us be a part of your team!

name: KOURTNEY KEITH
text: Best monogrammer EVER!!! Love Reata and everything she has in the store. She is always willing to help everyone. Thank you Reata for making sure all of my monograms are the BEST!!! Customer service is top notch!

text: I LOVE MS REATA!!  I HAVE GOTTEN SEVERAL ITEMS FROM HER STORE AND SHE IS ALWAYS THE BEST!! SHE TRIES TO HELP ME WHEN IM IN A JAM WITH GIFTS!  THANK YOU SO MUCH FOR MY CAP AND BLUE JEAN AUBURN SHIRT!!

resp.text: War Eagle! Girl!

name: Adam Crocker
text: Had a great experience. Took a touch longer than i really wanted to get my shirts made, though that's partially my fault. Extremely happy with how they have turned out! Reasonable pricing and quality products with friendly employees. You rock Andrew👍

name: Minnie Raven
text: Very awesome staff and great customer service in record time. Will recommend to anyone and also will be coming back for more business! 👍

name: Cartridge World Vestavia
text: Andrew Grundy with Logo Express has been a great customer of mine at Cartridge World Vestavia. They did a great job with our new ball caps and car magnets. Couldn't be happier with the product, service and expertise. Forget those online logo companies and stay local with Logo Express!

name: Keith Davis
text: They are such good people always willing to workout the best dills... Good work & the wait is never long

name: Garrett (gbam243)
text: Great price and super quick turn around

name: Andrea McCormack
text: Absolutely love this place!  I pass by it everyday and decided to pop in for a Christmas gift. They were so friendly and helpful!  I went back the next day with stocking to monogram. They had them done the same afternoon!  Highly recommend!  I’ll definitely be back!

name: Mick Britton
text: Logo Express do great work at affordable prices. They have produced embroidered and printed shirts for us and we've been happy every time.

name: Dana Benson
text: Great work! Excellent customer service and speedy return!

name: Jonatha Temple
text:
Logo Express  offers a variety of  customizable monogrammed items, like uniform shirts, hats, handbags and more!   Logo Express is the absolute best monogram and uniform company I have ever used ! Shan and his staff are always kind, professional, and caring.

I have used Logo Express for several years and have NEVER been disappointed. I have three different companies that I get shirts for. I purchase Uniform shirts, tee shirts, hats and more. Shan helps me with getting my logo digitized and will provide a sample of the logo on fabric so I can see what it looks like.

Shan and I have worked together for so long that all I have to do is text him and he gets my order ready, Like I said previously, I have never been disappointed with Logo Express and I can say with confidence that if you use Logo Express you will not be disappointed either! Great Company!

name: Allison Solomon
text: Great staff, great work.  Timely and reasonable pricing.

name: Melanie Alexander
text: Great quality work, quick, and affordable. Highly recommended!

name: i Swint
text: Logo Express provided me with same day service when I needed it and on my other others, they were very fast as well!

name: Leigh Holliman
text: Terrible!!! DO NOT USE THEM! This guy ruined my husbands business shirts and then was so ugly when I asked him if he would redo them or fix them in some way. Threatened to call the police and then asked me to leave his shop!

resp.text: As a small business owner of LogoExpress, I take full responsibility of this unfortunate experience of a very challenging customer and regret at full extent. We have been serving greater Birmingham area with our services for the past 24 years with word of mouth recommendations only, we take pride in what we do and will continue to feel good of our purpose by doing the right thing.

name: Arthur Steber
text: Always great!!!

name: Anita Michelle Olds

name: Deanne Le
text: They are so helpful here! Super friendly and professional and let’s face it in 2019 it’s hard to find professionalism. You will not be disappointed here! This place and the people turn out impeccable work!

name: William Lovell

name: Jordan Lovell
text:
Really disappointed in Athens Athletics this year.  They shorted me one Jersey and two hats for youth baseball.  They told me the items would here by opening day.  Long story short, they weren't.  Nobody called, nobody apologized, no explanations were given....  I was told they had ordered me a shirt, but they no longer had the size I needed, so they ordered a different size.  Also, eventually, they told me the hats had never been ordered.

I came today and they refunded me my money that I paid them 2-3 weeks ago.  I still don't have the hats and shirts for everyone :(

resp.text: I apologize that you were not called or apologized too. These hats and jerseys are trademarked and we can’t produce them ourselves because of MLB. When the company is out of stock and tells me they can’t give me a date of when they will be there I chose to get the next size so you would have something for opening day. The hats were ordered originally and shorted from the order so they were reordered. It is not our intention at all for you not to get what you order. If I could print them myself this would not be an issue. Again I apologize for this happening!

name: Michael Muse
text: Great people awesome prices!!!!

name: juan ramirez
text: Nice guy

name: Rickey Moran
text: Great service and is awesome place to shop.

name: Chris Jordan
text: Everything you want a hometown sports store be.

name: Jason Norris
text: Great local store with awesome customer service.

name: Janet Sanders
text: I love the entire staff. Everyone has always been so helpful. Even when I am unsure of what to order for my business they always seem to know exactly what I need. I will always be a repeat customer.

name: William Burkett

name: Glenn Koehler

As the buzz continued around the city from church to school and even in local stores once you guys opened back up the buzz really began to sing, Friendly, local home feel and always willing to help in anyway they can, prices are reasonable and worth every penny!

text: Great hometown sporting goods store. Friendliest service you could ever hope for.

name: Brian W. Kittrell
text: They have a pretty nice selection of merchandise and a very, very nice selection of high end candles. You could almost spend an entire day smelling all the different candles trying to find just the right one. They also have a nice selection of Caldrea cleaning products. I was, however, very disappointed in the staff. For the most part they were rather aloof and uninformed about the several things I asked, which were fairly basic questions.

name: Judy Halstead
text: Great gifts for anyone on your list!!!

name: Cynthia Buchheit

name: Brenda Palmer
text: Very friendly staff that meets all of your needs with a smile!!!!!   Very professional & down to earth...has good selection of items.

name: Jennifer Housley
text: These girls stay open until the last minute thank goodness, I need last minute pirate get up for my 4 year old, they hooked me up and I'm so grateful. I mean I showered up with 5 minutes to spare on closing time. They are sweet, helpful and I'll never drive all the way to Huntsville to go to the party store, ours here in town has everything!

Staff was friendly professionals helpful but not pushy. Very well stocked and neat store.
Thank You!

resp.text: Thank you so much for your support! We are so glad yall came!!! :)

name: AZ Detailing
text: Courtney and her staff are fantastic people, I brought in some shirts to get printed for my company and she went above and beyond to get them done right! Courtney will always have my guaranteed business for any party, event, or vinyl work I need done! Go and see them, she guaranteed has the best prices around and you get the best service! Thanks Party Central, we’ll be in touch!

name: James Truffa
text: Good place to get stuff for a party

name: Mrs. DeAviance Fowlks-Turner
text: Rented tables,  chairs,   balloons, and other party needs. Not bad; just wish they were located in Athens, AL.

name: Diana Kritinar
text: They have a ton of fun party stuff and a great selection of balloons! Also great for cake supplies!

resp.text: Thank you Diana!!!!

name: Jeffery Robison
text: Great place for all kinds of party needs, they make it easy for those special party items.

resp.text: Thank you Jeffery! Look forward to seeing you in the store!

name: Kenyon Smith
text: They are fabulous!!!! Had so MUCH TO CHOOSE FROM!!!!  Excellent service 💗💗💗

resp.text: Thank you so much! Thank you for shopping local with Party Central :)

name: Miranda Towe
text: Very disappointed in the selection for birthday parties. They had more graduation and older kids and adult stuff than kids.

resp.text: I am very sorry we didn’t have what you wanted. We strive to keep what customers are asking for. Let us know what you were looking for so we can bring in to the store for the Decatur area.

name: Kristen Chandler
text: I used to love this store, but not after my last purchase.  Make sure to check every single item before you leave cause they give you a hard time on exchanges WITH receipts & you only get 2 exchanges.  I will not spend a single dime here again!!  Unfortunately I've already given them hundreds of dollars over the years before finding out how ridiculous they could be.. Sincerely, a very disappointed ex-customer!!  I'll be taking my money to Huntsville's party stores from now on!!

resp.text: I appreciate every customer but we don't allow returns on costumes in October for obvious reasons.  I made an exception for this customer and actually replaced masks twice that her children played in. After two exchanges I wrote no more exchanges on this ticket. Anyone that would like to know more can call me. Nancy 256-353-5555

name: Instigatee
text: Worst store ever. The owner is down right rude. I have never been so mad when I have left a store. My children were holding small toys and playing with each other. She quickly said alright kids put the toys down. Which my children didnt hesitate to do so. However, it made me mad because she never even ask if I was going to purchase these items. So I put the items that I was going to purchase up and told her I would never buy anything from her store again. She said oh well its my store. And I should teach my kids manners. My children are very well mannered. She is an old miserable lady that has nothing better to do than to try and make other peoples lives miserable. She was disrespectful and very thoughtless when dealing with a customer.

name: Kim Rutherford
text: This place has all your party supplies. Good selection.

resp.text: Thank you Kim!

name: Glenn Byrum

Bio orb i.v un

resp.text: I’m not sure what that means?

name: Wes Phillips
text: Went to this place looking for some uniform gear and possibly a new pair of boots however, the store was empty and a sign in the window saying that it was for rent or lease. Don't bother going here because nobody's at home. since it's been a little while since I had visited that place I'm not sure how long they've been closed up. Covid-19 must have got them. They were kind of a struggling business anyway last time I was in there their stock was almost depleted.

name: Josh Davis
text: I wish there was a half a star rating. Our police department used state grant money to buy $600 worth of equipment. Six months after the full payment, we called to find out where our gear was and was told it was on back order. Two more months went by and we call, only to be told they are not sure what's going on with the order. Later that week, we called and were told they had to order the equipment from a different vendor. Now 14 months later, we cannot get anyone to answer to get our money back. Worthless crooks and I would not advise anyone doing business here.

name: James Burton
text: Sorry to hear their closing, but I did get great deals on several things!

name: Donna Johnson
text: Awesome... The staff and selection are great. Will be purchasing all my uniform needs here from now on.

name: Caroline Graham Craig
text: We use Duty Gear for all our work apparel. They even make custom patches! Friendly staff and great prices on monogramming

name: tim deen
text: On 4/6/17 I ordered three uniform shirts and was told they would be in in two weeks. After two weeks I call back and was told they were on back order. This went on every week until on 5/19/17, I was told they were in and were on the seamstress' table to have stripes and patches sewn on first thing Monday morning. I arrive Monday afternoon to pick up my shirts, only to be told that they would not be in until the next day. I get a little hot and just told the cashier to refund my money and I'll order from Amazon. When I asked to talk to the manager, the cashier informs me that he was the person who just ran to the back of the store. NO CUSTOMER SERVICE!!!!! I understand that items will be back ordered, but it is an entirely different issue to be lied to and to waste your gas to find out that the management lied to you. I will never set foot in this place again and I will notify my department and every other officer that I know, what a poor quality business that this is. Ordered from Amazon and they will be in on 5/26/17. Should have started there first.

resp.text: We certainly regret the miscommunication that occurred yesterday while Mr Deen was here. As he states he was informed late last week that his shirts were here and waiting for our seamstress to apply the patches he had provided. That was indeed the case, but when she came to these shirts, there was some confusion as to which patches were to be applied. As a result, the shirts were not complete when the customer arrived. I have personally spoken with this customer and explained that there was a misunderstanding that resulted in his impression that the shirts were not here and that he had been misled. My offer to him was and is to do whatever I can to make this up to him, including immediately applying these patches at no cost to the shirts he is purchasing online. Understandably, he is quite upset, but my offer will stand and I sincerely hope that given time, he will allow me to rectify this issue and regain his trust as a customer.

name: Justin Craig
text: They are always so friendly and welcoming. We use them mainly to monogram our work shirts and they always turn out great!

name: Big John
text: I have always been treated with respect when I went in there. Maybe they did not have exactly what I wanted but I am hard to please and they really try hard. They stop what they are doing to help you. I do wish they were in a better neighborhood but their location is centrally located for the majority of their customers so I cannot really fault them for that. I am not a police officer but I go in to buy stuff for my sons who are with the local VFD and they have a good selection of  the 5.11 and black boots that I wear. They are quick to point out the specials and any type of sales they are having. This kind of thing helps a lot when you don't get reimbursed for your gear.

name: Nicole W.
text: Nice staff. Good selection of duty clothing for Leo's, EMS, and fire fighters. Prices are fair.

name: kenneth Becker
text: Loved it great place to get uniform

name: Devin Hadden
text: Very friendly staff. I love how they speak to everyone as they walk in. Plus it's open to the public.

name: Kenneth Provitt
text: Salesperson was very helpful in trying to assist locate the right.

name: Bart Butler
text: If your a cop, fireman, and, whatever, they have what you are looking for at reasonable prices!

name: Carol Foster
text: Not as good of a selection as I expected.

name: Jorsher
text: It's a small place and I wish they had a bigger selection of 5.11 Tactical clothing, but the service was great and prices were great.

name: Eddison “Trintobajan” Lucombe
text: Best place in town to get uniform equipment

name: glen ponder
text: Friendly staff but limited selection. Pretty much out of luck if you wear any kind of brown or khaki uniforms.

name: Scott Hostetter
text: Great staff!

name: Scott Hostetter
text: Great staff!

name: Whoday 100
text: Not much in store to buy better to shop online.

name: James Pettus
text: Great service

name: Manuel Holstein
text: not so hot

name: kim rosario
text: Fast service

name: Dusty Nix
text: Expensive

name: Gary Summitt
text: Another quality job completed on time as promised.

name: Susan Peele
text: They did an amazing job photographing my large paintings!

name: Aimee Dodds
text: Dennis and his team are professional, knowledgeable and helpful.  They provide fast turnaround, and the end product is always high quality.  They are my apparel decorator of choice for my business.  I highly recommend!

name: Alex Friedman
text: Listen to the rest of the reviews here - I've had multiple negative experiences with them (specifically Gary) over the past few months. You have better options than InkWorks. I'll be taking my business somewhere else nearby.

name: Jajuana Haston
text: I spoke to Gary on the phone seemed pleasant gave me his email address. I emailed him what I needed done on 12.6.18. Never received a response. I emailed him again asking for an update 1.3.19. He said that they couldn't do it in a timely matter. Mind you this is one shirt and I never gave a timeline. I asked when can they have it done , he responded sometime in March because they are very busy doing orders for Wal-Mart

name: Ryland Spitzer
text: Very poor communication. They told us we needed a minimum order of 36 t shirts, we had over 60 shirts. Gary would not respond to us and then told us that the turn around time we wanted was not reasonable. However I believe 3 months is more than reasonable. Gary was very rude to us and told us that our order was not worth their time. I do not recommend Inkworks and if you do decide to do business with them I would Highly not recommend Gary.

name: David Solomon
text: Stay far away from this company.  Gary is not to be trusted.

name: Jeff Hall
text: Definitely number 1 if you need screen printed or embroidered shirts. Family run business and highly recommended

name: Farra SG
text: An online company misplaced our order and didn't inform us until the evening before  our event. Inkworks moved mountains and printed shirts for us in one day and they were perfect!

name: Jessica H
text: This company has poor communication and says one thing on the phone and another in an email. They messed up our order as well and caused it to be even further delayed. I used based off the fact they are a provider for someone I know and did not use either of my friends in the business, however this was a big mistake. On the phone we discussed Gilden and in an email I was quoted some poor quality shirts as a price match. I am sorry, but a shirt of poorer quality is not an equal match. I hope the people who get these shirts don't fuss too much because I am not happy I even have to give them to them. They represent my group poorly and I will not do business with them again. They did apologize, but that was a little too late and not enough especially considering I still have no shirts, but they have managed to get other shirts to our school.  If you have a contract with a school you should keep their colors in stock, however they must not because I kept being told they had to order. Ridiculous...

name: Glynn Dykes
text: Great service, good product. Better location than the previous downtown location.

name: Nicole M. Zaffiris
text: This company is terrible. Sent them an order for a large client. They printed the wrong blue in spite of being clearly stated on the purchase order in two places and then would not return calls or emails. Customer received the shirts and informed us that the 2XL's were completely missing.  After repeated phone calls and unanswered emails we replaced the shirts at our expense. They have had those shirts for two months now and when push came to shove today after asking when the shirts would be printed we were first told by Teresa that their machine broke down and they needed to send out for parts. When I asked them if all five machine broke down at the same time I then received a call back from Carol who said she was the owner and I was told they would not be printing the shirts because they were less than their minimum. Minimum?  I guess that they have no problem with not correcting their mistake. Coincidently I have a copy of there price list and on it states 1 is the minimum so not sure why 22 shirts is less than minimum. I have been in business for 32 years and I value a good vendor that stands behind their work. This is definitely not the case with InkWorks.

name: shauna Roberts
text: My husband worked here and when he left because of tge way they treated him they wouldnt even give him his final paycheck. Shady PEOPLE.

name: Rebecca Metts
text: Friendly staff

name: Ronna Cashon
text: Job

name: Kayla Johnson
text: I had my husbands company name printed on a sweatshirt and it turned out PERFECT!!! This was a last minute Christmas gift and I placed my order on Dec 17th. While others wanted to charge me $85 for a rushed fee, she did not charge me nearly that much! She gave me a VERY fair price and did great work! I was very impressed! I will forever use Trifecta for all my printing needs from now on!

name: Chenequa Farrar
text: I have purchased 3 masks from her and the quality and comfortably of the masks are perfect and reasonable pricing. I wear my mask all the time. I get a lot of compliments about my mask. Winsome is Bomb.com. If you are looking for a mask that you can breath out of and comfortable contact her she has superior products.

name: Ariel Willis
text:
I had Winsome Paperie make my invitation suite. I loved how they came out and the special touch with the coral paper was perfect.

She also made the menus for the reception.

There were minor hiccups do to unforeseen circumstances which caused the loss of a star but overall the quality of work is great.

name: mark drost
text: works wonders with my project ideas--

name: R Hill
text: I use Mainstreet for all our corporate logo apparel.  The quality is second to none, the pricing has always been reasonable regardless of the order size, and the service cannot be beat.  I have never witnessed Donna nor any of her staff be rude to anyone and are always accommodating to all.  These reviews saying otherwise are either trolling or are competitors attempting to  bring a great business down to their level.  You will have a great experience with Mainstreet.

name: Kevin Lee
text: An amazing time working with all the staff here. The owner and staff are all very involved and went out of their way to help me design and make a gift for bridesmaids last minute! If you want quality products at a great price and in a timely manner, this is the place to go!

name: N Lucy
text: I'm ALWAYS there. It's addicting 😂😂😂. I Love seeing my name on things. Mrs. Donna and her staff are AMAZING BEAUTIFUL PEOPLE. Customer top tier. I wouldn't go anywhere else for my Monogramming

name: Sabrina marie
text: So nice and made us a shirt right on the spot!

name: Patricia Lynn
text: The staff is very friendly and they complete all of our monograms requests very quickly and their prices are superb!! Plus the gift store is just packed with funny goodies to look at...we get a lot of items done here because they are so fast & friendly

name: Jordin Barkley
text: Great attention to detail and quick turnaround. I have used MM for years and always pleased with results!!

name: Brooke Cardwell
text: Found this place when searching for someone to put my boys names on their beach towels— I waited until the last minute (the day before our beach trip), and these guys were the only ones willing/able to help me! I went in, and after being helped by the girl at the counter I just looked around the shop while waiting. They have really cute stuff— from jewelry, to beach totes, to toddler nap mats and more, definitely a good variety of items, as they had a little bit of everything, and the prices were definitely fair. The work done was great. I will definitely use them going forward, and recommend them to others as well.

name: Melise Harris
text: Do NOT order from this company. Wish I could give no stars. When ordering for our daughter's GIRLS SOFTball team the owner ordered the jerseys in a men's large. They swallowed the girls and they couldn't wear them for their tournament. When we escalated this to the owner Donna, she was helpful at first but then later reigned on what she had agreed to do and said that it wasn't her fault because we "didn't specify women's" when we placed our order. Which is incredulous because surely that's implied when ordering for a 12 year girls softball team. She did agree to replace them all but only if I returned all the other ones....the ones she will be throwing away. Not only did that say to me that she was trying to make me have a chore to do just for spite but when I tried to explain how this was not acceptable she continued to argue with me over and over again until I couldn't take it anymore. I was so frustrated with her and this company that I decided it would be better to find a different local company and just re order the whole thing and pay out of pocket for it. (Keep in mind coaches are volunteers and now we are out hundreds of dollars on top of our time.) Our softball commissioner agreed that this isn't the kind of company we want to do business with and I hope this review helps to save someone else this trouble.

name: Laura Sirles
text: They monogrammed my bridesmaids' gifts and did a beautiful job! The prices were very reasonable and the work was great! The workers were all very nice - she even helped me make a decision about the color to be monogrammed. I will definitely be back!

name: Cashidah Hunt
text: Walked in to this business today with the bell ringing announcing when someone walks in. No one greeted me, but I made my way further into the store because I could hear people talking. There were 2 employees (1 was the owner I think) behind the counter talking to a customer about her daughter, college, etc... not a problem. The employee sees me but still doesn't address me for about 5 minutes. Then when she sees me waiting for assistance, instead of 1 of the 2 coming to help me as I never patronized this business before and never will again, she starts a new conversation about her upcoming doctor's appointment. I came to make a purchase,  not listen to someone go on and on and not even have the decency to acknowledge a customer. I walked out and will never return. I took my business elsewhere and was very satisfied with their service. This place needs to step up its service to ALL customers. I can see why there were hardly any customers there. #poorservice #poorleadership

name: Luther Garrison
text: Donna is super nice but super busy. She needs help. However she's done a lot of work for me and she does a great job.

name: laurie lawson
text: They have a good selection of gifts and their work is fabulous 👌😊 I have used them several times and am never disappointed!

name: Dr. Chelsea Meyer
text: Wonderful people and really great work. I’ll be back. 😊😊😊

name: MaeMae Denise
text: This location was recommended by a friend of my sister, I have then used them 3xs in less than 2 months. The staff is super friendly and professional, and the monogramming is BEAUTIFUL. I HIGHLEY recommend Main Street Monogramning to EVERYBODY.👌😊

name: Laura Hession
text: We are always greeted with a friendly hello and welcome!  The owner Donna, and all her employees are helpful and the quality of merchandise is great!  We became loyal customers quickly!

name: Lorraine Fuselier
text: Very helpful! The staff and owner was very accommodating! Definitely will get all my future business!

name: Amy Johnston
text: Monograms done quickly and look great. My only complaint is that I wish they had more fonts.

name: Meredith North
text: I love this store, must visit every time I come to see my daughter.

name: TAMICA SHIPMAN
text: Always friendly!!! She aims to please, quick turn around and the quality of her products are superb!!! She will definitely continue to get my service!!

name: Julie Schneider
text: Great service and fast turnaround on monogramming!

name: Katherine Carrigan
text:
The monogramming and pricing are great. Beautiful products and merchandise, however, the attitutes of the owner is preposterous. I was spoken to like a complete hassle for coming into their store. Like I was an idiot and they couldn't believe I came to them.
Communication for pick up and drop off was never spoken, so as a first time costumer, I was very confused and belittled.
I do not recommend to anyone who wants to feel like a decient human being.

name: Stacey Smith
text:
I have been a long time customer of Mainstreet Monograms (2+ years). I found their smaller store less overwhelming and the choices were very simple.
Over time, I found these qualities to be the things that caused me to dislike Mainstreet Monograms.
The staff is not always pleasant and I have been privy to talk of misused prescription medications by an employee and often have to endure the smell of the lunches they eat at the counter while you order (ew, y'all). And would it kill them to smile or be pleasant?
However, I will say, the owner has always been pleasant and accommodating. It's her business so I guess she's more invested in things running smoothly and making the customer happy. When you are a small business you have to be exemplary and treat your customers well.
The final straw came at Christmas this past year. I had purchased ponchos from their store. They were discounted, but again, they came directly from their store.
I gave them several weeks notice to apply a vinyl adhesive to the ponchos. We talked at length about the application. Heat couldn't be used (it'd melt the ponchos), but they assured me the vinyl would stick. They told me that it was commercial grade vinyl that sticks to cars, mailboxes, and cups - and holds up well for years.

Weeks passed, phone calls were made, and finally I was able to pick up my purchase. Unfortunately, when I came to get them I was appalled at the quality. They were essentially stickers on ponchos. A child could peel them off. When I addressed this with the clerk she was extremely rude and said "I didn't say they'd stick forever."
I was at a loss. How could someone mess up and then not even apologize???
Furthermore, this employee had personal knowledge of the family this product/gift was going to. That said, I wish she would have handled the situation with more kindness and professionalism.
Thankfully, the manager swooped in to save the day. She refunded us our money and apologized. We had to scramble to find a replacement Christmas present which was an inconvenience they caused. Managable but very frustrating.
In the end, the manager handled it well. But the product was disapointing as was the application. My biggest concern here is who's standing behind the register.

Know this: Rudeness sticks with people and will keep them away. Consider a possible re-hire or a Dale Carnegie course for your employees. Also, try to make your store more stroller friendly. With many moms as customers you will have strollers in your store -- you'd be well advised to make room for them, or they may leave like I have.

name: Lou Grala
text: Super nice employees, and awesome work done on time.

name: LifewithJMB
text: Ok y’all!! The owner is my new best friend hahhaa soooo welcoming and she has EVERYTHINH! Even blanks 💕 this is officially my new favorite store

name: Pat Garlikov
text: Great to create the special gift.

name: Emily Dudley
text: I purchased a pair of shoes from this store, but after my daughter wore them one day, the bow fell off. So, the following business day, I took them back to the store to see if I could replace them. My review is based on the owner’s attitude when I approached the counter. She immediately let me know “I was the only person to ever have an issue with those shoes.” She also remarked “I mean, they cost $28, so you get what you pay for.” I felt very stupid by the time I left the store. I decided to just keep the shoes, but take the bow off the other shoe so both shoes will at least match. I had been warned by other friends who’ve shopped there that the owner is rude and customer service is lacking, but I now know for myself! I’ve spent a lot of money there over the past year, but will not be going back.

name: Vannah Norrell
text: Best place anywhere for little ones!!

name: Tanisha Foster
text: Service was awesome. She has great business hours as well. I came in with a last minute request, which was an emergency to me and I truly appreciated her fitting me in. No, it wasn't free, but it was the service that made it so great..  It came out perfect. The prices are too reasonable.  I have paid triple for what she charged me.  Thank you so much.

name: Erica Ham
text: She can make anything! I love Mrs. Shelia! She is always the one to do all my families shirts♡ Never a complaint with her amazing clothes

name: Carmen Ebbert
text: I take my daughters book bags each year ! Never disappoints! Gets them done fast too !

name: David Smith
text: The lady there was so helpful

name: estelma garcia
text: Wow nice place

name: Susan O'Gorman
text: The lovely ladies at What-A-Stitch are friendly, talented and professional! They have done excellent work for me for several years. Even during the hectic Christmas season rush, they are cheerful and smiling.  Their workmanship is always perfect and is frequently ready earlier than promised. They never disappoint!

name: Hannah Simmons
text: Called asking if they did alterations. I was informed they did not, but the lady was still so helpful anyways. She asked me what area I was around and gave me a few options on where I could go. I told her I needed a place not so pricy and she led me to the perfect place! 25$ to get my dress altered and it was done in 15 minutes! Thank you so much for the help

name: Barbara Brettel
text: Awesome ladies, service and completed projects.

name: Tripp Atkins
text: These women can do anything.  So friendly and accommodating.  They always go above and beyond.

name: Cinde Pocase
text: What A Stitch is a great local business.  I love their work and they are a fun place to visit.

name: Elisabeth Wells
text: Amazing, competent owners!

name: Linda Murphy
text: I use this fabulous monogram shop frequently! They do great work.

name: Andy Thomas
text: These girls just do fantastic work, and are eager to help with ideas and suggestions.  I can't recommend them highly enough!

name: Nicole Tate
text: Love them

name: Susan Huddle
text: Great

name: Jon Patton
text: Super helpful staff very friendly huge stock

name: THERESA PERDUE
text: Visited this business in search of a gift for our daughter.  Purchased a stethoscope,. Theconly thing non pleasing I can say they dont monogram, even though the website says they do. Customer service was excellent

name: Angie Bailey
text: Always so helpful!

name: Daniel Mengel
text: Get all my Scrubs from them. But they are Expensive.

name: Belinda G
text: Friendly, helpful staff. Large selection of scrubs. Very pleasant shopping experience - highly recommend!!!

name: Carol Roberts
text: My daughter got a volunteer job with the hospital and was sent to this store to buy scrubs. The young lady waiting on us was super nice and helpful. She was friendly and explained a lot of things to us. We also got a really nice discount because my daughter was volunteering at the hospital. They had a great selection and we found lots of cute scrubs.

name: Karen Cordell
text: Great service

name: Myrose Neamon
text: Rude customer service, spent almost thirty-five dollars on two shirts that my kid cant even wear that THEY recommended to us (it fit but wasn't within school uniform), and then when I went to return it, and they said that i cant return anything that was on sale (with an attitude), and when I got back to my car I realised that I'd been had. I paid full price. Nothing on the receipt said anything thing about no refunds on sales, anyway. Please fix this.

name: Steph Shu
text: Nice options, helpful staff, but not a great selection of sizes.

name: LaSandra Williams
text: Great  customer service

name: Andre Firefighter Young
text: Efficient!

name: Melissa Saladrigas
text: High quality products great customer service and scrubs are so comfy!!

name: Nurse P
text: Never have anything in the men’s collection, NEVER! Then when you order something, it takes months to get it.

name: Melissa Green
text: Rude Judgemental staff that feels they have a right to pick and choose who shops in a public store. And every single thing in this place is super high priced. You can buy scrubs for 6 bucks at Wal-Mart compared to the 29 bucks that you would pay for one shirt at this place.

name: Kim Hunt
text: Please update hours 🙄🙄

name: Paula Matthews
text: Love this place

resp.text: Thank you Paula for your business and your kind words.

name: Richetta Phillips
text: Bad

name: Richard Whitehead
text: Told me I could pick up my uniforms on a certain date, was not ready. Told I could pick it up another date, still was not ready. Rude and unhelpful staff.
